UNIQUE Passive - Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal ( 10% / 6%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 60 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

UNIQUE Passive - Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit apply a stack to enemy champions for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. Attacking a champion with 2 stacks consumes them to deal 40 − 120 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (20 second cooldown).
